column5: awesome pics!  Thank you for sharing.
Wow! This almost had me tearing up! What an awesome Dad you are and what a great family:) the report is absolutely awesome as well!!! Well done man, well done!
Always great to read about the kids enjoying the outdoors !!
boy, you had an awesome season..did the same with my 2 kids , got them on ice a few times this season and they loved it. my daughter out fished me every time . great time for kids! good job!
Great read and wonderful shots of your son enjoying the outdoors.
File it under 'a great winter!'  Thx for sharing
Great report and what a beautiful family you have. I can only hope that when I have children they enjoy the outdoors just as much. Thanks for sharing!
Awesome year, soon he'll be teaching you how to catch them!
THATS what its all about right there!!  Good work!! Great report!  S.
awesome !!! what he learns now he'll never forget, best education, you're a good dad
Thanks for the very kind comments gang.    Now I'm looking forward to open water fishing with my little guy.

When my two boys were at that age,I couldnt say no to taking them. First one started at age 2,the other a little  later,as he was kinda a mommys boy. Not that theres anything wrong with that. But once they both were full blown anglers,it was awesome to have them both with me fishing. It,s a feeling and memory you never forget.  Great report WNF.  Thanks for taking the time to post and share.

Thanks for the very kind comments gang.    Now I'm looking forward to open water fishing with my little guy. Thats awesome….loved every picture….some really good memories for sure. It was just to darned cold here this year and did not get out much at all….so like you looking forward to soft water with my little helper.
Great pics , and good on ya for taking him out! R
Brought tears to my eyes!  "Dad I'll always go fishing with you"!!  Great report- thanx for sharing!  Wonderful pix
